mapper.select: select fi.id from companyCard cc left join tbl_qy qy on cc.company_Id=qy.nid left join card c on cc.card_Id=c.id, fileitem fi where c.picUrl=fi.id

select c.id as id, c.cardName as cardName, c.picUrl as picUrl, c.unit_id as unit_id, fi.id as pic_id, fi.description as pic_description, fi.filesize as pic_filesize, fi.mimeType as pic_mimeType, fi.originalFilename as pic_originalFilename, fi.content as pic_content, u.pointId as pointId, u.pointName as pointName, u.pointRate as pointRate from card c left join fileitem fi on c.picUrl = fi.id left join unit u on c.unit_id = u.pointId where c.defaultCard = 1
